parse.title: Skeletons (Slayer assignment)
parse.text:
Skeletons are a type of Slayer assignment.

Contents

  • 1 Slayer Masters
  • 2 Eligible monsters
    • 2.1 Surface
    • 2.2 Dungeoneering
    • 2.3 Minigames
    • 2.4 Quest

Slayer Masters[edit | edit source]

The following Slayer Masters assign skeletons:

MasterTask amountsUnlock requirements
Jacquelyn15-25 15, The Blood Pact
The Raptor95-125None
Vannaka40-60 15
